CustomField.formula:
if ( and(CONTAINS(Course_Product_Line__c, 'TTT'), SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Evaluations'), 0,
if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Counterbalance"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Narrow Aisle"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Order Picker"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Pallet Truck"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Scissor Lift"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Articulated Boom Lift"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Telehandler"), 50, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Overhead Bridge"), 50, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Cab Operated"), 50, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Jib Crane"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Gantry Crane"), 50, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Single Beam"), 50, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Articulated"), 25, 0) + if(INCLUDES( Additional_Devices__c, "Cable Boom"), 50, 0))
CustomField.label: Additional Devices Cost
